articles.author: Jennifer A Dlouhy, Catherine Lucey
articles.title: Trump Says He’s Open to Tariff Talks With EU After Threatening 30% Levy - Bloomberg
articles.description: President Donald Trump indicated he is open to more trade negotiations, including with the European Union, even as he insisted that his letters threatening new tariff rates are “the deals” for US trading partners.
